com.sdklite.aapt

Interface ValueType


  • public interface ValueType
    The types definition of ResourceValue
    Author:
    johnsonlee

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte ATTRIBUTE
      The 'data' holds an attribute resource identifier.
      static byte DIMENSION
      The 'data' holds a complex number encoding a dimension value, such as "100in".
      static byte DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTE
      The 'data' holds an attribute resource identifier, which needs to be resolved before it can be used like a ATTRIBUTE.
      static byte DYNAMIC_REFERENCE
      The 'data' holds a dynamic ResTable_ref, which needs to be resolved before it can be used like a REFERENCE.
      static byte FLOAT
      The 'data' holds a single-precision floating point number.
      static byte FRACTION
      The 'data' holds a complex number encoding a fraction of a container.
      static byte INT_BOOLEAN
      The 'data' is either 0 or 1, for input "false" or "true" respectively.
      static byte INT_COLOR_ARGB4
      The 'data' is a raw integer value of the form #argb.
      static byte INT_COLOR_ARGB8
      The 'data' is a raw integer value of the form #aarrggbb.
      static byte INT_COLOR_RGB4
      The 'data' is a raw integer value of the form #rgb.
      static byte INT_COLOR_RGB8
      The 'data' is a raw integer value of the form #rrggbb.
      static byte INT_DEC
      The 'data' is a raw integer value of the form n..n.
      static byte INT_HEX
      The 'data' is a raw integer value of the form 0xn..n.
      static byte NULL
      The 'data' is either 0 or 1, specifying this resource is either undefined or empty, respectively.
      static byte REFERENCE
      The 'data' holds a reference to another resource table entry.
      static byte STRING
      The 'data' holds an index into the containing resource table's global value string pool.
